title: Lake Roosevelt National Recreation Area: Avian Mystery
body: Avian Mystery         Bald eagle in flight. NPS Photo  Program Requirements:   A 10 foot wide and a minimum of 5 foot tall wall area where a sheet of felt fabric can be anchored to the wall.  Program Overview: As your students build a life size jigsaw puzzle they learn from each other about this mystery bird: the Bald Eagle! Once the puzzle is complete they will know which bird they have been describing Shhhh! Don't tell them what the program is about! The less they know the more fun it is!      Grade: 4th-8th    Group Size:  Minimum: 10, Maximum: 29    Program Length:  1 hour      Fill out our reservation form to schedule a program or contact our education specialist for more information.
